key.name: codexbar-path
key.description: The command or absolute path to the codexbar CLI executable. If not absolute, it will be searched in PATH.

key.name: provider
key.description: Which AI provider(s) to monitor: codex, claude, gemini, antigravity, both, or all.

key.name: refresh-seconds
key.description: How often to fetch usage data from the CLI, in seconds.

key.name: include-status
key.description: Whether to fetch and display provider status page information.

key.name: show-used
key.description: If true, displays percent used instead of percent remaining.

key.name: show-label
key.description: Whether to display the percentage label next to the icon in the panel.
